Plot Heatmap (wrapper for ComplexHeatmap)

Source: R/plotting.R
plotHeatmap.Rd

Plot Heatmap (wrapper for ComplexHeatmap)

plotHeatmap(
  bank,
  assay = "own.expr",
  dataset = NULL,
  lambda = NULL,
  M = NULL,
  cells = NULL,
  features = NULL,
  col = NULL,
  col.breaks = NULL,
  col.discrete = NULL,
  annotate = FALSE,
  annotate.by = NULL,
  order.by = NULL,
  annotation.name = TRUE,
  annotation.size = 6,
  annotation.pos = "right",
  barplot.by = NULL,
  barplot.border = FALSE,
  barplot.width = 0.5,
  cluster_row_slices = FALSE,
  show_row_dend = FALSE,
  show_row_names = TRUE,
  cluster_rows = FALSE,
  cex.row = 4,
  row_gap = 1,
  cluster_column_slices = FALSE,
  show_column_dend = FALSE,
  show_column_names = FALSE,
  cluster_columns = TRUE,
  cex.column = 2,
  column_gap = 1,
  rasterize = FALSE,
  max.cols = NULL,
  name = "Expression",
  ...
)

Arguments

bank

BanksyObject

assay

assay to plot heatmap (one of own.expr, nbr.expr or banksy)

dataset

dataset to plot heatmap

lambda

lambda if assay == banksy

M

maximum azimuthal Fourier transform to plot

cells

specific cells to plot

features

specific features to plot

col

colours to use in heatmap

col.breaks

color breaks to use in heatmap (same number as col is specified)

col.discrete

cluster colors, named color array, names are clusters, values are colors in hexadecimal

annotate

add annotation for cells

annotate.by

metadata to annotate cells by

order.by

metadata to order cells by (one of annotate.by)

annotation.name

show annotation name

annotation.size

size of annotation labels

annotation.pos

position of annotation labels

barplot.by

metadata to plot barplots (numeric)

barplot.border

show borders of barplot

barplot.width

barplot width

cluster_row_slices

cluster row slices (BANKSY)

show_row_dend

show row dendrograms

show_row_names

show row names

cluster_rows

cluster rows

cex.row

row label size

row_gap

row gaps between row slices

cluster_column_slices

cluster column slices (annotations)

show_column_dend

show column dendrograms

show_column_names

show column names

cluster_columns

cluster columns

cex.column

column label size

column_gap

column gaps between column slices

rasterize

rasterize if TRUE

max.cols

max columns to display - will subsample if not NULL

name

name of heatmap legend

...

parameters to pass to ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap

Value

Heatmap of class ComplexHeatmap

Examples

# Generate a simulated dataset
d <- simulateDataset(n_cells = c(20,20,20), n_genes = 30)
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = d$gcm, cell.locs = d$locs, meta.data = d$meta)
bank <- NormalizeBanksy(bank)
bank <- ScaleBanksy(bank)
set.seed(100)
plotHeatmap(bank, annotate = TRUE, annotate.by = 'Label')
#> Annotating
